All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages

S

save() - Method in class com.paint.paint.Controller
This method is used to save the image on the active canvas.
save(StackPane, imageTab) - Static method in class com.paint.paint.fileIO
This method will save the current canvas to the location of the last saved file, bypassing the opening of a file explorer instance and selection of a location.
saveAs() - Method in class com.paint.paint.Controller
This method functions similarly to the save() method, the difference being that saveAs() will open a file explorer instance asking the user to specify the directory they wish to save in.
saveAs(StackPane, imageTab) - Static method in class com.paint.paint.fileIO
This method opens a file explorer window for the user to specify where they would like to save the contents of the active canvas, then takes a snapshot of that canvas and saves it at the specified location.
select(Canvas, GraphicsContext) - Static method in class com.paint.paint.Edit
This is one of many methods used internally within the cursorUpdate method.
selection - Static variable in class com.paint.paint.Edit
selection is a Rectangle2D object that stores the current selection.
setActives(Tab) - Static method in class com.paint.paint.Display
This method sets the active canvas to the one on the top of the StackPane, and the active stackpane to the one belonging to the currently selected tab.
setCanvas(Canvas) - Method in class com.paint.paint.imageTab
 
setLastSavedFile(File) - Method in class com.paint.paint.imageTab
 
setParentTabPane(TabPane) - Method in class com.paint.paint.imageTab
 
setScrollPane(ScrollPane) - Method in class com.paint.paint.imageTab
 
setStackPane(StackPane) - Method in class com.paint.paint.imageTab
 
setUnsavedChanges(boolean) - Static method in class com.paint.paint.Display
This method sets the unsaved changes boolean to true or false.
showFiletypeWarning(TabPane, imageTab) - Static method in class com.paint.paint.Display
 
showImage(Canvas, GraphicsContext, String) - Static method in class com.paint.paint.Display
This method is used to display an image on the active canvas.
showSaveWarning(TabPane, imageTab) - Static method in class com.paint.paint.Display
This method is called to show a warning dialogue window when you try to close a tab with unsaved changes.
start(Stage) - Method in class com.paint.paint.Main
The starting method for the application containing the tasks needed to open the application window.
